MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the PA5 postcode area of Johnstone. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6:30pm to safely complete repairs on our underground cable network outside 8 Campbell Street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:20pm on Saturday, 09 January 2021
